text: Hereford is an unincorporated community in northwest Callaway County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. The community is on Missouri Route DD 2.5 miles north of I-70.Missouri Atlas & Gazetteer, DeLorme, 1st ed., 1998, p.38 ==History== A post office called Hereford was established in 1898, and remained in operation until 1907. The community was named after the Hereford cattle near the site. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Callaway County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Hereford, Missouri
